alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 09 at 7:33PM CST until February 13 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. At 19.0 feet, Low lying pastures will flood. Cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:05 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to rise, cresting at a stage of 18.2 feet early Friday morning. It will then begin to fall, falling below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
